channel.title: Cvs on James Thomas
channel.description: Recent content in Cvs on James Thomas

item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: James Thomas Experience NERA Economic Consulting, Research Officer, Oct 2019-Present (1 year, 5 months) I am currently working in NERA’s Antitrust and Competition Practice in London. My experience includes working on a variety of market investigation, merger, cartel, abuse of dominance and state aid cases across a range of industries and jurisdictions. During my first year at NERA, I spent a lot of time working on a market investigation before the Competition and Markets Authority (“CMA”).
